name: Bug Flock: The Heist
description:
You are a bug (red ellipse), you love cookies (those yellow circles). You are an influential bug, you lead your comrades (white ellipses) in the direction you are going when close to them.

The goal then is to guide a flock of bugs below a cookie to carry said cookie to a  target (red crosses) and gain points. YEAH!

But beware, those nasty frogs (blue circles) are out to get you. Oh, never forget that you are being followed by a set of nasty human feet (black line at the bottom of your screen). They will squash any bug/cookie/target that they catch.

Movement: arrow keys or hjkl; pause: space bar; q for score screen and subsequent quit (also with q)
